results.text: I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
results.reason: This verse emphasizes personal empowerment through faith.
results.reflection: God is the source of my strength and capabilities.

results.text: The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.
results.reason: This verse highlights a personal relationship with God as a provider.
results.reflection: With God guiding me, I have all I need.

results.text: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
results.reason: This verse reassures of God's presence and support personally.
results.reflection: God's presence alleviates my fears and strengthens me.

results.text: Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
results.reason: Jesus offers personal rest to those who are struggling.
results.reflection: I find rest in Jesus amidst life's burdens.

results.text: I have been crucified with Christ and I no longer live, but Christ lives in me. The life I now live in the body, I live by faith in the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.
results.reason: This verse speaks of a personal transformation through faith in Christ.
results.reflection: My identity is found in Christ who dwells within me.
